headline.main: Enemy Advance in Burma Is Checked North of Pegu; JAPANESE CHECKED IN BURMA BATTLE

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March l -- Scanty reports reaching London today indicated increasing activity on the Burma front after a lull of several days in hostilities. Apparently using picked troops, the Japanese are attempting to force their way northward along the Sittang River. A Rangoon communique said the United Nations' air forces were operating "in forward areas" but that no enemy air activity was reported.
abstract: Burma group reptd en route to India
